abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox trade pitchers Wade Miley and Jonathan Aro for Carson Smith and Roenis Elias of Seattle Mariners; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: Boston further bolstered its bullpen, agreeing to a trade with Seattle for Smith and Roenis Elias while dealing starter Wade Miley and reliever Jonathan Aro.

headline.main: Red Sox Acquire Carson Smith From Mariners
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Acquire Setup Man From Mariners

snippet: Boston further bolstered its bullpen, agreeing to a trade with Seattle for Smith and Roenis Elias while dealing starter Wade Miley and reliever Jonathan Aro.
